name: Bumpi.io
description:
Bump your way to victory in Bumpi.io – the hottest new free multiplayer game that brings you bumper cars as you’ve never experienced before! The last bumper car standing wins!

Bumper Cars, prepare for battle!
Bumpi.io brings the excitement of bumper cars to a free game you can play anywhere! Choose your bumper car, enter the bumper car game arena, and bump your way to victory by bumping your opponents outside the arena. Get bigger and bigger with every opponent you bump out of the arena. The last bumper car standing wins!
It’s a fast and intense online multiplayer game experience like no other!

Bumpy Fun Features!
• Dozens of colorful cars to choose from
• Easy, intuitive controls make this an online game for everyone
• Win coins as you play to buy power-ups to upgrade your bumper car
• Fast and smooth online multiplayer gameplay
• Completely free to play!

Do you have what it takes to be the last bumper car standing? Download Bumpi.io and play the bumpiest, craziest free game NOW!
